## 继承
1 extends
2 组合继承
function Parent (){}

function Child (value) {
  Parent.call(this, value)
}

Child.prototype = new Parnet();

3 寄生组合继承 (推荐)
function Parent(){}

function Child(value) {
  Parent.call(this, value);
}

Child.prototype = Object.create(Parent.prototype);
Child.prototype.constructor = Child;
